description: Akane is a young woman with exceptional skills who carries on the name of the famous Yagyuu clan, possessing the rare Demon Eye of the Oni trait. Prior to the beginning of the game itself, Akane is assigned the duty of hunting down Munenori Yagyuu to restore her clan`s honor. Assuming the name of Juubee, Akane hears of Soki`s deeds and finds him at the Plains Outpost at Suruga to defeat him. But after losing to him, she joins him in his fight against the Genma.
name: Yagyuu Juubee Akane
